title: AWS DynamoDB: Backup & Recovery Strategy
summary: “Amazon DynamoDB is a fully managed NoSQL database service […]”. That’s what Amazon states in the DynamoDB FAQs. However, their definition is not quite what I would understand as fully managed. It’s missing counter-measures against the human error. For that reason, we need a DynamoDB backup and r...
